name: Site Survey and Report
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(Site Survey and Report:[IF]([GT](<*VALUE(OWS_EstimatedNo ofAccessPoints for Site SurveyArea)*>,30)){<* Eval(32+24+8+8+12+<* Eval(0-INT(0-(<*VALUE(OWS_EstimatedNo ofAccessPoints for Site SurveyArea)*>/4*10))) *>*2+(<*VALUE(OWS_Estimated No of Field InstrumentsTested Survey)*>/2)+40+<* Eval(0-INT(0-(<*VALUE(OWS_EstimatedNo ofAccessPoints for Site SurveyArea)*>/2))) *>+16) *>}{<* Eval(32+24+8+8+12+<* Eval(0-INT(0-(<*VALUE(OWS_EstimatedNo ofAccessPoints for Site SurveyArea)*>/4*10))) *>*2+(<*VALUE(OWS_Estimated No of Field InstrumentsTested Survey)*>/2)+40+16) *>}[ENDIF])*>
